user_sentiment: Mildly critical but constructive - user is offering course corrections and suggesting a different approach
execution_quality: The agent made reasonable technical choices but missed the user's environment constraints (Guix SD without systemd) and failed to clarify the desired interactivity level before implementation.
work_category: Implementing a scheduled digest generation feature with cron-based automation. The agent created a Python script and integrated it with system scheduling.
summary: The agent implemented a working solution but missed critical context from the CLAUDE.md instructions about the user's Guix SD environment (no systemd) and made architectural choices without first clarifying that the user wanted an interactive, iterative approach rather than automated scheduling. The user's follow-up indicates the feature needs rethinking toward a discussion-based workflow with manual tuning before automation is appropriate.
follow_up_pattern: User is pivoting toward a more interactive, discussion-based approach rather than fully automated scheduling, and wants to iterate on the digest/scoring logic before deployment
